description.ruby-sapphire:
Growls cutely to reduce the
foe’s ATTACK.
description.emerald:
Growls cutely to reduce the
foe’s ATTACK.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user growls in
a cute way, making
the foe lower its
ATTACK stat.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user growls in an
endearing way, making
the foe less wary.
The target’s Attack
stat is lowered.

The user growls in an
endearing way, making
the foe less wary.
The target’s Attack
stat is lowered.

The user growls in an
endearing way, making
the foe less wary.
The target’s Attack
stat is lowered.
description.black-white:
The user growls in an endearing way,
making the opposing team less wary.
The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.

The user growls in an endearing way,
making the opposing team less wary.
The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.

making opposing Pokémon less wary.
This lowers their Attack stats.

effect.full: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
